page.description: Specifies if the Layout allows editing.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.ALLOWCHANGESTATUS() method returns .T. (TRUE) if the layout allows editing; otherwise, it returns .F. (FALSE).

section.title: Example
section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = form.load("Customer Information") ? ptr.AllowChangeStatus() = .T.
